content: baby bear hat ***ears*** this is the tricky part you will be picking needles 5mm/ size 8 up the 8 bars between double pointed needles dpn set of 4 yarn worsted weight/wool ease other needle to weave in ends ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ gauge 5 stitches per inch or 20 sts/4 in fits newborns diameter 5 5inches 11inches without stretch ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ k2tog = knit two together ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 8 stitches - on each ***hat*** side like this cast on 50 stitches distributing stitches on 3 dpns 17 17 16 for each ear 1 join in the round and knit 3 5 inches 1 knit four rounds 2 *knit 3 k2tog* **repeat garter stitch 3 knit 3 rounds 2 k2tog knit 4 k2tog 4 *knit 2 k2tog* **repeat 3 k2tog knit 2 k2tog 5 knit 2 rounds 4 k2tog k2tog 6 *knit 1 k2tog* **repeat 5 k2tog 7 knit 1 round 6 break yarn and pull through last stitch 8 *k2tog* **repeat this may cause a point but you can 9 break yarn and thread through round it out as you weave in the ends remaining stitches pull tight and 7 weave in ends weave in ends ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ without ears with ears © gilda knits 2011 do not copy & redistribute if selling finished product give gilda knits credit thanks www gildaknits etsy com deargilda@hotmail com www ahandmadeprincess etsy com ravelry gildaknits
